install.name: JWallpapers Best Rated module
install.author: Arunas Mazeika
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 Arunas Mazeika - All rights reserved
install.description: A module to display the best rated JWallpapers pictures

param.name: menu_id
param.label: JWallpapers menu item ID
param.description: Provide the ID of a JWallpapers menu item, e.g create a JWallpapers best rated pictures special view menu item (in the Joomla Menu Item Manager) using the categories defined below and attach it to this module by introducing its ID on this field. This field is used to attach a JWallpapers menu item to this module and to provide the module with SEF links (without the words component and jwallpapers on it)

param.name: category_ids
param.label: Category IDs
param.description: Provide a list of IDs (separated by commas) of the categories that you would like to include on this module. Use zero (0) to include all the categories

param.name: target_new_window
param.label: Show picture details in a new window ?
param.description: If set to Yes, the detailed picture view will be shown in a new window when a thumbnail from the module is clicked. Otherwise the view will be shown in the same window. The same applies to the more pics link

param.name: show_thumb_info
param.label: Show the thumb info ?
param.description: If set to Yes, the picture info (visits and ratings) will be shown regardless of the global JWallpapers settings

param.name: show_thumb_title
param.label: Show the thumb title ?
param.description: If set to Yes, the thumb title will be shown regardless of the global JWallpapers settings

param.name: thumbs_columns
param.label: Number of columns
param.description: Number of columns for thumbnails display

param.name: thumbs_lines
param.label: Number of lines
param.description: Number of lines for thumbnails display

param.name: show_more_pics
param.label: Show more pics link ?
param.description: If set to yes, the more pics link will be shown

param.name: more_pics
param.label: More pics text
param.description: The text of the link. This link will take the visitor the Best Rated special view if the Category ID is set to zero (0). If the category ID is set, it will take the visitor to the corresponding category view

param.name: thumbs_width
param.label: Thumb width (px)
param.description: Use this field to override the size of the thumbs. The given width will be used instead of the real thumb size defined in the main component settings

param.name: thumbs_height
param.label: Thumb height (px)
param.description: Use this field to override the size of the thumbs. The given height will be used instead of the real thumb size defined in the main component settings

param.name: thumbs_wrapper_height_mod
param.label: Thumb wrapper height modifier (px)
param.description: Use this field to modify/optimize the height of the element that contains (wraps) the thumb. The approximate height (some additional pixels are added for borders) of the element equals the sum of the thumb height plus this value. This field adds the necessary extra space around the picture in order to show the thumb info, title and template effects. The obtained results while changing this value will depend on the CSS styles of both JWallpapers and your template. Insufficient or exaggerated space may result on broken (bad looking) thumbs

param.name: thumbs_wrapper_width_mod
param.label: Thumb wrapper width modifier (px)
param.description: Use this field to modify/optimize the width of the element that contains (wraps) the thumb. The approximate width (some additional pixels are added for borders) of the element equals the sum of the thumb width plus this value. This field adds the necessary extra space around the picture in order to show the thumb info, title and template effects. The obtained results while changing this value will depend on the CSS styles of both JWallpapers and your template. Insufficient or exaggerated space may result on broken (bad looking) thumbs
